title: Adelic local–global relation for HEO
statement_md: There exist adelic weights $(w_p)_p$ with $\sum_p w_p = 1$ such that $$\log \mathbf{H}_d^S(k) \approx \sum_{p} w_p \log \mathbf{H}_{d,p}^S(k).$$ The CI checks a uniform-weights baseline on simple polynomial sequences.
assumptions_md: Arithmetic S (here: polynomial). Local densities via exact modular enumeration for small $p^N$.
evidence: Exact counts mod $p^N$ for small primes; numerical agreement on toy families.
